sn37.32:4.1: “Mendicants, there are five things that are hard to get for females who have not made merit.
sn37.32:4.3: ‘May I be born into a suitable family!’
sn37.32:4.5: ‘Having been born in a suitable family, may I marry into a suitable family!’
sn37.32:4.7: ‘Having been born in a suitable family and married into a suitable family, may I live at home without a co-wife!’
sn37.32:4.9: ‘Having been born in a suitable family, and married into a suitable family, and living at home without a co-wife, may I have children!’
sn37.32:4.11: ‘Having been born in a suitable family, and married into a suitable family, and living at home without a co-wife, and had children, may I master my husband!’
sn37.32:4.13: These are the five things that are hard to get for females who have not made merit.
sn37.32:5.1: There are five things that are easy to get for females who have made merit.
sn37.32:5.3: ‘May I be born into a suitable family!’
sn37.32:5.5: ‘Having been born in a suitable family, may I marry into a suitable family!’
sn37.32:5.7: ‘Having been born in a suitable family and married into a suitable family, may I live at home without a co-wife!’
sn37.32:5.9: ‘Having been born in a suitable family, and married into a suitable family, and living at home without a co-wife, may I have children!’
sn37.32:5.11: ‘Having been born in a suitable family, and married into a suitable family, and living at home without a co-wife, and had children, may I master my husband!’
sn37.32:5.13: These are the five things that are easy to get for females who have made merit.”
